function.name: add_collaborator
function.description: Adds a user as collaborator to the default Cyoda repositories (quart-client-template, java-client-template). Use when user requests repository access, push rights, or to be added to repositories. The AI must extract the GitHub username from the user's request - cannot invent usernames.

username.description: GitHub username extracted from user's request. Must be provided by the user - AI cannot invent this.
